column4: my laptop freezes completely when i put my wireless card in the slot, can anyone help me out?
what card?
- Linksys WPC54GS

- i don't think it is definately related to just this specific wireless card (although i can't be sure), but it freezes the instant i put it in, and i've read of similar problems with other people with different wireless cards.

i was looking on hcl for your card

http://doc.gwos.org/index.php/LinksysWireless
^^hcl
- did you find anything of use?
your specific card is not on the list
- i believe my card the WPC54GS is the same as WPC54G
- any ideas?
there are a few different drivers for the card
1 sec

no clue :/
